books.title: Recommended Books
books.subtitle: Essential reading for every software developer, from beginner to advanced

recommendations.clean-code: I don't make the rules, it's very influential. I read it and think +/- half the ideas have value.
recommendations.refactoring: One of the easiest books to recommend. Refactoring is good.
recommendations.pragmatic-programmer: Another book very easy to recommend. Every dev should read it.
recommendations.software-architecture: Software Architecture AND Software Architecture: The Hard Parts.
recommendations.art-science-engineering: Personal opinion, perhaps the best book I've read in the last 2 years.
recommendations.grokking-algorithms: Introductory book for structures and algorithms. If you don't understand this, it's a good book. If you already do, it won't be very useful.
recommendations.mythical-man-month: Timeless classic on software project management.
recommendations.sicp: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs. The foundation of computer science.
recommendations.extreme-programming: The fundamental book on XP and agile practices.
recommendations.tanenbaum-os: Modern Operating Systems. The definitive textbook on the subject.
recommendations.k-and-r: The C Programming Language. The origin of it all.
recommendations.ddd-red-book: Domain-Driven Design. The classic red book.
recommendations.cormen: Introduction to Algorithms. The definitive academic guide on algorithms.
recommendations.knuth: The Art of Computer Programming. The magnum opus of computing.
